name: crossfit-wod-api
description: REST API inspired by this a tutorial of [freeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/rest-api-design-best-practices-build-a-rest-api/#our-example-project). A CRUD application for the workouts of the day. The workouts can have tips on how to perform it.   It is a [Client-Server-Mode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Client%E2%80%93server_model) distributed application.
author: Vin√≠cius Costa
